item.title: [DISTRELEC-3168] Facet Range Slider: Add input fields & unit
item.description:
The adaptation of the range facet consists of two tasks:

  • THIS TICKET: adding of input fields and unit
  • DISTRELEC-4589: change of compatible facets from checkbox to slider
item.summary: Facet Range Slider: Add input fields & unit

comments.comment: Will be discussed again for roll out 2.0

Similar tickets cover parts of this change here:
DISTRELEC-3167
DISTRELEC-2598
=> resolving those tickets.

Concept suggestion for input field below slider:

  • Suggest to write the unit next to the input fields, not in the title. This way the numbers don't stand there alone, and also we don't have any units or further info in the title anywhere else
  • Slider and field must be directly linked: if the slider is moved, the number must update immediately; if the number is changed (with a delay of a few ms), the slider must move to the new position immediately
  • Application of the filter: There are two options.
    • Option 1) is recommended if the search result updates via page load (currently the case)
      • A small button ("go" or "apply" is placed behind the "to" input field
      • This button must be pressed for the filter to apply, regardless of whether the range was set by input field or by slider
      • Page reloads on click with the applied filter
    • Opeion 2) is recommended if the search result is dynamically refreshed via AJAX (will be achieved with DISTRELEC-3212)
      • Result directly updates after the lower or higher boundary of the range is updated (with a small delay when using the input field)
      • Note: this option requires refactoring the behavior of filters for full AJAX support. This would be a separate change, but it would be a significant improvement to the search.

Further input:

  • If there is more than one unit available (e.g. "m", "cm" and "mm"), then the unit should be selectable with a dropdown (one dropdown for both fields)

I estimate 3 days of Frontend Work.

Right now we have three types of facets:

  • Slider
  • Checkbox
  • Radio Buttons

Frontend

  • Add input field below the slider with units as label or dropdown next to it
  • Update slider and textfield if one of them is changed
  • Assume that this change should be made on the existing range slider and won't result in two different slider components

Backend (covered in DISTRELEC-4589)

  • Define which of the current checkbox facets should be implemented in this way with this new type
  • Provide it to the Frontend using the existing $ {facet.type.value}

    attribute

Please note that after this change request, it won't be possible to select certain values (i.e. 4, 6, 10, and 15) but only a range (4 - 15).
See FacetRangeSlider.png for concept suggestion as per description in comment above.
range slider is done. Currently there is a delay of 300ms after e keyUp until the ajax call gets done. if a bigger timeout is needed, please assign back to me. can be tested after next deployment

Tested in Q:

Works as expected.
Improvement in separate ticket: DISTRELEC-4648

=> closing this ticket.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4559] SEO - Internal Search Crawlable by robots
item.description:
Observations :

  • http://www.distrelec.ch/search?q=* is accessible to crawlers.
  • GoogleBot have inside his supplemental index over 7M url with this url pattern.

Impacts :

  • In SEO, this issue is know as a crawler blackhole.
  • Crawlers spend time on this pattern and loose themself in infinite query and pollute their index.
  • That lead into not crawling the important and relevant pages and finally not be ranked properly inside the search engine result pages.

Demands :

  • Replace the entire content of http://www.distrelec.ch/robots.txt by this content : 
    # Block access to specific groups of pages
User-agent: *
Disallow: /search
Disallow: /checkToggles
Disallow: /cart
Disallow: /checkout
Disallow: /my-account
Disallow: /login
Disallow: /import-tool
Disallow: /support
Disallow: /feedback
Disallow: /medias/sys_master/*.js
Disallow: /_ui/all/cache/*.js
Disallow: //app/etc/local.xml
Disallow: /medias/sys_master/*.gz
Disallow: /gsitemap*.xml.gz

# Allow search crawlers to discover the sitemap
Sitemap: http://www.distrelec.ch/sitemap_index.xml

# Block BadBot
User-agent: CazoodleBot
User-agent: MJ12bot
User-agent: dotbot/1.0
User-agent: Gigabot
User-agent: admantx
User-agent: Wget
User-agent: semvisuBot
User-agent: Baiduspider
User-agent: SITRIX Crawler
User-agent: BLEXBot
Disallow: /
  • Add inside the html head of every pages of this pattern http://www.distrelec.ch/search?q=* this meta tag : 
    <meta name="robots" content="noindex,follow,noodp,noydir" />

Checking process :

  • This issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-4558] SEO - URL Migration Issues - HTTP Redirect 302 to change into 301
item.description:
Observations :

  • Several url pattern of the previous and current website are redirected with 302 http status, exemples :
    • old website product url pattern
      https://www.distrelec.ch/kleinsign-diode-do-35-75-v/diotec/1n4148/603016 & http://www.distrelec.ch/kleinsign-diode-do-35-75-v/diotec/1n4148/603016
      -302> http://www.distrelec.ch/p/603016
      -302> http://www.distrelec.ch/fr/Diodes-SMD-DO-35-75-V-Diotec-1N4148/p/17000557 (200)
    • old website family url pattern
      https://www.distrelec.ch/silizium-kleinsignaldioden/diotec/1n-4-bav
      -302> http://www.distrelec.ch/silizium-kleinsignaldioden/diotec/1n-4-bav (404)
    • old website home redirect :
      http://www.distrelec.ch/home/de
      -302> http://www.distrelec.ch/?lang=de (404)
    • old website ssl redirect :
      https://www.distrelec.ch/*
      -302> http://www.distrelec.ch/* (200)
    • new website product dynamic rewriting url pattern
      http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Axial-fan-DC-120-x-120-x-38-mm-24-VDC-Sunon-PMD2412PMB1-A-2-GN/p/15413483
      -302> http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Axial-fan-DC-120-x-120-x-38-mm-24-VDC-Sunon-PMD2412PMB1-A-%282%29-GN/p/15413483 (200)
    • new website https to http dynamic rewriting url pattern
      https://www.distrelec.ch/en/Automation/Wireless-Communication/GPS/c/cat-L3D_525576
      -302> http://www.distrelec.ch/en/Automation/Wireless-Communication/GPS/c/cat-L3D_525576 (200)
      ...

Impacts :

  • In SEO, to transmit the potential of a webpage to another one, we must use redirection with the http status code 301.
  • The current 302 redirection don't transfer any "Page Weight" to the redirected pages, resulting into a failed migration on those multiple faulty pattern.

Demands :

  • All the 302 redirect rules inside the distrelec.ch .htaccess must be transformed into 301 redirect,
  • All the 302 redirect rules inside the distrelec.ch automatized url rewriting scripts (if existing) outside the .htaccess must be transformed into 301 redirect,
  • All the upcoming redirection to do must be in 301 status,
  • Exception for maintenance pages, they need a 503 in the header when active.

Checking process :

  • This issue can't be closed without my final live check.
  • Thank you to update the status of the implementation in the comment below.
item.summary: SEO - URL Migration Issues - HTTP Redirect 302 to change into 301
